name: translate_to_old_english
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool old_english_translator.
Tool description: Convert modern day English phrases to Old English, the language of the Anglo-Saxons.
API description: Translates the given text to Old English using the FunTranslations API.

x_funtranslations_api_secret.description: API Key ( Get yours here : http://funtranslations.com/api/oldenglish )

text.description: The text to be translated into Old English.
text.default: A hearty meal, a happy laughter is all we need.
